Blog.post: Went back to school todae.. after having a realli good rest at home on tuesdae.. =D.. but after de whole dae in school.. so tired again.. haiz.. first.. hav to face some gossipers faces .. second.. needa fast and hav to run here there during softball.. realli tired man.. juz wish school give one week holidae.. to hav my "beauty" sleep.. hahax.. ErM.. Reuben joining softball.. WoHo~~.. and Marie is now officially a Child of God.. WoHo~~.. though i realli had a hard time to preach to her.. cuz of all these distractions in class.. monkeys and noisy ah ma all over de place.. but praise God.. i manage to.. To some ppl.. it's so easy to sae sorry.. but they dun mean it? but to some ppl.. it's so difficult to say sorry cuz of their pride? now.. both are bad.. DuHz.. I was being insulted so badly on Mondae.. although i out-talked those freaks.. i still felt hurt.. but at least one of dem know de right to apologise.. with sincerity.. now tt is good.. not like some stubborn ppl.. did bad things to me.. still dare tok bad abt me.. Now im not cursing or wad.. but they're sure to burn in hell.. and it's ETERNITY Anyway.. I care for my mEi Kz? SomeMore she so nice.. always kena saboed.. so ahem*.. dun ever try to take tt privilage into advantage.. or i'Ll SkIn You aLiVe.. anyway.. tt's abt it..

MoRnInG alreadi drenched in water.. wad a wae to start a dae.. anyway.. got new student named Robben.. erm.. nice lad.. juz dun follow Gladass i mean.. Gladwin.. den he wont turn bad.. Gladwin Gladwin.. act beng.. Pu-LeaSe.. u like so small.. i can kill u juz by giving u temasek slap.. PhOtO taking was fun.. cuz we squeezed Joseph out of de FuN-ShOt.. now u know why it's so fun? HaHaX.. but felt abit guilty eh.. but it's over.. so.. wadeva! ErM.. AfTer SchOol TuiTion.. den go SkATe!.. woho.. it's being so long since i last skated at a park.. now im back in action.. manage to capture back ollie.. erm.. muz learn kick-flip soon.. like ben said " dun stay in ur comfort zone".. muz rmb eh.. anyway.. had realli good skate todae.. AfTeR skate.. De beng-skater wanna play pool.. so hav to drag my ass to bedok valley 8 to play wit him.. he so paiseh.. i beat him like wad =P.. though i lost a few times cuz i accidentedly knock de black ball.. den he act good.. wad sia..

Todae Todae Todae.. had realli good sleep last night.. though it's like only 5 hours.. so in school wasn't sleepy at all.. all lessons were so-so.. but de 2 bucks thingy was damn funnie.. well.. i realli am a bad class manager.. didnt even give back de 2 bucks to its owner.. but it's not totally my fault.. no one wanna claim it.. den richard bought drinks with it.. haiz.. should hav used it myself SoFtBaLl was fun todae.. but coach says mabbe i will join de senior.. gosh.. i'll be completely loser out there with those ppl.. and saw my boarding hse mate on de bus.. also juz came back from school.. soccer.. de thing is.. he stink like fart.. oh well.. luckily im not his room mate.. phew.. DiNnEr was a total crappy.. my freaken guardian doesnt wanna cook for me juz cuz im moving out.. and i havent pay this month rental bill.. argh.. tml got photo taking session.. ~~BoRiNg~~.. juz hope everyone loooks good.. lolx..

Haiz.. another dae in school without good sleep.. worst.. i flunked my chinese spelling.. den miss KiM Tu's maths test by juz awhile.. he nagged like as if i killed his dog.. den come to english.. slept. throughout de lesson.. den dreamt of something strange.. very strange.. i dreamt of God.. erm.. but de image was very blur.. still figuring wad he wants me to do.. anyway.. after school go makan den after tt go tuition.. 14 was total crap.. i'm nvr takin tt bus again.. tuition was worst.. got realli bad headache.. erm.. surely cuz of de sleepless nights.. ltr gonna give both my hp to a fren to sell in cambodia.. juz hope can get high price.. muahahahax.. and also play abit of pool.. WohO~~ Im off

Todae woke up aRd 6.12.. was damn lazy to get my ass off the bed.. cuz it's so cosy.. plus i slept aRd 1 de night before.. or.. de morning.. lolx.. SchOoL was Okiex lahz.. i pulled through another dae without passin up holidae assignment.. but de whole 1/1+1/3 chinese class kena lecture.. but den de teacher nvr scold me le.. den ppl felt unfair.. say i her pet.. -_-'.. wadeva it is.. im NoT.. erm.. let see.. AfTeR school went to meet Ang, Nikki, Nicholas and Johan.. sitting at pasta mania and eat nothing.. oh ya.. muz rmb tt Ang borrow 50 bucks.. came back from TM.. got tuition.. den lecture from english tutor.. AgIaN~~.. yaWnZzZ~~.. but she was right.. i've been slackin.. in fact like every moment i am.. HaIz.. how how? gimmi suggestions if u can eh.. ErM.. After tuition was suppose to Sk8e with Ben.. but cuz of de stupid rain.. we've to call the whole thing off.. SaD man.. Gotta admit.. 1/1 has being much better class since de begining of the year.. BuT GuYz plz dun learn from De BaD Me eh.. hahax.. (as if i hav good me) -_-.. And One MoRe THing.. I'm protective.. anyone guy girl gay les or unsure try to hurt my dear mei.. i gonna wack their ass..
